title: This charging pad can juice up three devices at once, and it’s now only $33
content:
Macworld

Since we’re all on the go and packing at least one web-enabled device these days, all of which need power, a gift like this ultra-convenient 3-in-1 charging pad is one that’s almost assured to meet with universal approval. Now, for a limited time, you can get this multi-functional wireless charging pad for only $32.99 (reg. $69). It’s virtually disappointment-proof!

Compatible with the most recent iPhone, Apple Watch, AirPod, and other Qi wireless-enabled Android models, this simple and foldable wireless charging pad detects optimal charging speeds, then funnels the perfect level of charging power right to up to three of your thirsty devices simultaneously. You can surge a maximum of 15W to your phone, with another 5W charging your AirPods and 2.5W left for powering up your Apple Watch, all at the same time. 

https://youtu.be/8AWEVyxdnJo

Designed to fold 180°, this wireless charging pad can even serve as a portable phone stand, featuring strong magnetic suction that locks your phone firmly in place so it never slips or falls, even if it’s shaking! Plus, it’s a handy accessory for anyone on the move, as it elegantly folds up to slip into a purse, backpack, or pocket for easy transport anywhere.

This charger also features two indicators and is 100% safe, featuring the following safety measures:

  • Over-voltage protection
  • Over-current protection
  • Short-circuit protection
  • Temperature control
  • Foreign object detection

This holiday season, give yourself or a loved one the gift of streamlined charging.

The 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad is a perfect stocking stuffer – with a price to match. Grab it for just $32.99 for a limited time!
